content.raw:
Thanks, @{557058:67759e29-d1df-465f-868d-047738e36fc9} , but it didn’t help. I now get an error even during clean build:  
      

```
[gazebo:make] /media/data/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogPlay.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::util::LogPlay::Open(const string&)’:                              
[gazebo:make] /media/data/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogPlay.cc:132:51: error: ‘class tinyxml2::XMLDocument’ has no member named ‘GetErrorStr1’; did you mean ‘ErrorStr’?
[gazebo:make]      const char *errorStr1 = this->dataPtr->xmlDoc.GetErrorStr1();                                                                                       
[gazebo:make]                                                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                                          
[gazebo:make]                                                    ErrorStr                                                                                              
[gazebo:make] /media/data/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogPlay.cc:133:51: error: ‘class tinyxml2::XMLDocument’ has no member named ‘GetErrorStr2’; did you mean ‘ErrorStr’?
[gazebo:make]      const char *errorStr2 = this->dataPtr->xmlDoc.GetErrorStr2();                                                                                       
[gazebo:make]                                                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                                          
[gazebo:make]                                                    ErrorStr                                                                                              
[gazebo:make] gazebo/util/CMakeFiles/gazebo_util.dir/build.make:158: recipe for target 'gazebo/util/CMakeFiles/gazebo_util.dir/LogPlay.cc.o' failed                    
[gazebo:make] make[2]: Opouští se adresář „/media/data/gazebo/build/gazebo“                                                                                            
[gazebo:make] make[2]: *** [gazebo/util/CMakeFiles/gazebo_util.dir/LogPlay.cc.o] Error 1                                                                               
[gazebo:make] make[1]: *** [gazebo/util/CMakeFiles/gazebo_util.dir/all] Error 2            
```

‌                      

```
$ hg diff
diff -r 89bce7ffa618 cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake        Wed Aug 07 23:45:31 2019 +0200
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake        Tue Aug 13 03:34:49 2019 -0400
@@ -239,8 +239,8 @@
   endif()
 
   if (USE_EXTERNAL_TINYXML2)
-    pkg_check_modules(tinyxml2 tinyxml2)
-    if (NOT tinyxml2_FOUND)
+    pkg_check_modules(gztinyxml2 tinyxml2)
+    if (NOT gztinyxml2_FOUND)
         find_path (tinyxml2_INCLUDE_DIRS tinyxml2.h ${tinyxml2_INCLUDE_DIRS} ENV CPATH)
         find_library(tinyxml2_LIBRARIES NAMES tinyxml2)
```
content.html:
Thanks, @Michael Grey , but it didn’t help. I now get an error even during clean build: 

[gazebo:make] /media/data/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogPlay.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::util::LogPlay::Open(const string&)’:                              
[gazebo:make] /media/data/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/LogPlay.cc:132:51: error: ‘class tinyxml2::XMLDocument’ has no member named ‘GetErrorStr1’; did you mean ‘ErrorStr’?
[gazebo:make]      const char *errorStr1 = this->dataPtr->xmlDoc.GetErrorStr1();                                                                                       
[gazebo:make]                                                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                                          
[gazebo:make]                                                    ErrorStr

[gazebo:make]      const char *errorStr2 = this->dataPtr->xmlDoc.GetErrorStr2();                                                                                       
[gazebo:make]                                                    ^~~~~~~~~~~~

[gazebo:make] make[2]: Opouští se adresář „/media/data/gazebo/build/gazebo“

[gazebo:make] make[1]: *** [gazebo/util/CMakeFiles/gazebo_util.dir/all] Error 2

‌ 

$ hg diff
diff -r 89bce7ffa618 cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake        Wed Aug 07 23:45:31 2019 +0200
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake        Tue Aug 13 03:34:49 2019 -0400

         find_path (tinyxml2_INCLUDE_DIRS tinyxml2.h ${tinyxml2_INCLUDE_DIRS} ENV CPATH)
         find_library(tinyxml2_LIBRARIES NAMES tinyxml2)
